text: Monique Angela Hicks (n√©e Imes; born December 11, 1967), known professionally as Mo'Nique, is an American comedian and actress. She was born in Glen Burnie, Maryland. She is known for her role as Nicole "Nikki" Parker in the UPN series The Parkers from 1999 to 2004 and as Mary Lee Johnston in Precious, for which she won the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress. In 2002, she won a Grammy Award. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:American Academy Award winning actors Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:BAFTA Award winning actors Category:Screen Actors Guild Award winners Category:Satellite Award winners Category:American Grammy Award winners Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Maryland Category:Comedians from Maryland
title: Mo'Nique
